MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY14 postcode area of Malpas, affecting properties in Tilston, Barton and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to repair a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.41PM on 16th February 2021.
